des:
"With the Climax skill and Alexa, you can change the security mode of your Climax system, send alerts to your contacts via email or sms in case of any assistance needed and control smart home devices by voice.

There are 2 parts to setting up Climax. Enable and Link Accounts here in Alexa Skill. Add/Edit Contacts for alerts and Add/Edit smart home devices and scenes for automation in the Climax portal or App.

To set up Climax in Alexa
You first need to register and create an account with Climax portal at https://us.vestasmarthome.com/Vesta.

Once you have your account ready:
1. Click on Enable Skill button on this page
2. Then tap on the button that says Link Account
3. The Climax login page will display
4. Enter your username and password
5. Press Login to link your Climax account
6. For enhanced security, set up a 4-digit PIN code for each area (This step will be skipped if using medical panel)
7. A screen should display saying 'Account linking successful'


Next, go to Climax Portal to set up your contact list so they will receive the alerts, and set up your smart home devices and scenes.

For enhanced security, some commands require a PIN code to execute. When a pin code is required, Alexa will ask you to provide the pin code before executing the command. To change the security mode of your system, you can say Alexa, ask Climax Security to arm away, disarm, or arm stay. Alexa will respond with, please give me your PIN code. After you’ve provided your pincode and Alexa has verified, the command would be executed.

Here are a few examples to interact with your Climax home system:

[Security]

To arm the security system when you’re away,
Alexa, ask Climax to arm away or to arm away area 2 (if the security system supports multiple areas).

To disarm the security system,
Alexa, ask Climax Home to disarm.

To arm the security system when you’re home,
Alexa, ask Climax to arm stay or to arm stay area 2 (if the security system supports multiple areas).

[Medical]

To send a help alert say,
Alexa, tell Climax I need help
Alexa, tell Climax I’m in danger
Alexa, tell Climax to send help alert

To send a fall alert say,
Alexa, tell Climax I’ve fallen.
Alexa, tell Climax I've had a fall.
Alexa, tell Climax I can’t get up.
Alexa, tell Climax to report falling.
Alexa, tell Climax to send fall alert.

To send a panic alert say,
Alexa, tell Climax to panic.
Alexa, tell Climax to send panic alert.

[Automation]

To control a power switch,
Alexa, ask Climax to turn on {device name}.
Alexa, ask Climax to turn off {device name}.
Alexa, ask Climax to toggle {device name}.

To control a dimmer,
Alexa, ask Climax to turn on {device name}.
Alexa, ask Climax to turn off {device name}.
Alexa, ask Climax to set {device name} to {0~100}%.
Alexa, ask Climax to dim {device name} to {0~100}%.

To control a shutter,
Alexa, ask Climax to open {device name}.
Alexa, ask Climax to close {device name}.
Alexa, ask Climax to set {device name} to {0~100}%.

To apply scene,
Alexa, ask Climax to apply {scene name}.
